Original_Text: SAN FRANCISCO - Tech giant Nvidia announced a new AI chip designed to enhance machine learning capabilities, aiming to compete with industry leaders.
LONDON - The Bank of England raised interest rates by 0.25% to curb inflation, impacting global markets.
KABUL - Afghan forces clashed with insurgents in the eastern provinces, resulting in several casualties.
NEW YORK - A major retailer reported a 15% drop in quarterly profits due to supply chain disruptions.
SYDNEY - Researchers discovered a new species of marine life in the Pacific Ocean, raising conservation concerns.
BEIJING - China unveiled plans to expand its high-speed rail network, connecting rural areas to urban centers.
TORONTO - A biotech firm received approval for a new vaccine, boosting its stock price significantly.
PARIS - The European Union imposed sanctions on a tech company for violating data privacy regulations.
BAGHDAD - A car bomb detonated in a crowded market, prompting international condemnation.
BOSTON - A startup secured $50 million in funding to develop renewable energy solutions.
